means: 把…镀金( gild的现在分词 )
作多余的修饰（反而破坏原已完美的东西）

sentence.Network_en: Gilding the lily of what is basically a romantic comedy, the director falls a little short of his best mark.
sentence.Network_cn: 这基本上是一出浪漫喜剧，这位导演却画蛇添足，没有发挥出他的最佳水平。

sentence.Network_en: The dress is perfect. Don't add anything to it at all. It would just be gilding the lily.
sentence.Network_cn: 这条裙子已经很完美了, 别再作任何修饰了, 那只会画蛇添足.

entry.def: Gilding is a layer of gold or gold paint that is put on something.

means.word_mean: 1. a coating of gold or of something that looks like gold

auth_sentence.content: Gilding pale streams with heavenly alchemy.
